title: Combi Workshop Equality Constriants PO
subtitle: Quantum Optimization Training - part 2
description: This workshop (part 2 of the quantum optimization training) solves portfolio optimization with QAOA on the Classiq platform, focusing on how to add equality constraints to the problem. It models the portfolio (return, risk, budget) and encodes constraints for the QAOA ansatz. Includes TODOs and solutions.
